oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the Steamboat
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the distance of this photograph, Several men can be seen standing next to a large steamboat in the middle of an unidentified river. Steam pours from the boat's stacks. Nearby, a smaller canoe with two people floats by.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Earl S. Miers River Photograph Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Steamboats; Bodies of water; Men
